title: Failed to train the intents on a tenant with Aviator enabled
content:
You failed to train the intents on a tenant with Aviator enabled. Additionally, the training of intents for virtual agents in classic mode failed across all tenants.

Cause

A network issue occurred or some database configurations have changed after you enabled the Aviator capability.

Solution

Restart the virtual-agent-admin-ui pod as the suite admin.

For SaaS customers, contact the SaaS Operations team to do this for you.
